mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.freight_no AS "freightNo", a.name AS "name", a.cur_place AS "curPlace", a.send_people AS "sendPeople", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wemall_freight_info( freight_no, name, cur_place, send_people, create_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{freightNo}, #{name}, #{curPlace}, #{sendPeople}, #{createDate}, #{delFlag} )
